build.buildCommand: composer install --no-dev && composer dump-autoload && npm ci && npm run build

deploy.startCommand: bash -lc 'cp .env.railway.postgres.example .env 2>/dev/null || true; php artisan key:generate --force || true; php artisan migrate --force --no-interaction || true; php artisan db:seed --force --no-interaction || true; php artisan serve --host=0.0.0.0 --port=$PORT'
